text: Siyā ca tassā bhikkhuniyā kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya dirattatirattaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā senāya vasitabbaṃ
edit: Siyā ca tassā bhikkhuniyā kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya dirattatirattaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā senāya vasitabbaṃ

translations.transtext: 130. There being some reason or another for a bhikkhunī to go to an army, she may stay two or three (consecutive) nights with the army.
